content: i experimented with this design quite a bit because i knew i wanted it to be worked vertically to achieve the design i had in my head but honestly i m not a huge fan of the work-flat-and-sew-to-cinch method i ve used it in a handful of my patterns because it s the only way i knew how to achieve the vertical design but sometimes i feel like i can t close the top securely enough and the cinch often looks a bit unbalanced so after some thinking i thought up another method which i m sure has been done before by others to combine my favorite top-down method with a vertical design and i m really happy with how it turned out it s a little confusing to explain but i ve made a video tutorial for this pattern in case you need a little help
